title: Effects of Weathering and Simulated Gastric Fluid Exposure on Cellular Responses to Polystyrene Particles
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00444B, Paper
Liyuan Gong, Animesh Pan, Takeshi Matsuo, Hemma Kanniyappan, Irene Andreu, Alan Rothman, Geoffrey D Bothun, Mathew T Mathew, Yang Lin
Microplastics pose a growing environmental threat with complex implications for human health. Despite the extensive research on the cytotoxicities of microplastics, gaps remain in understanding cellular responses to the interplay...
